title: Conscious Dating
description: Approaching dating with intention, awareness, and authenticity

modules.title: Rethinking Dating
modules.description: Moving from reactive to intentional dating

modules.title: Knowing What You Want
modules.description: Getting clear on needs, values, and non-negotiables

modules.title: Authentic Self-Presentation
modules.description: Showing up as yourself, not a persona

modules.title: Navigating Early Dating
modules.description: Practical wisdom for the beginning stages

modules.title: Making Good Decisions
modules.description: Knowing when to continue and when to walk away

questions.question: Conscious dating primarily emphasizes:
options: Finding someone as quickly as possible
Intentionality, self-awareness, and authenticity
Using strategies to appear more attractive
Dating as many people as possible

questions.question: Values in dating are important because:
options: They make you more attractive to others
Chemistry can override everything else
Shared core values predict long-term compatibility
You should only date people exactly like you

questions.question: When noticing you keep attracting the same type of person:
options: You have bad luck
Patterns often reflect something in your own psychology worth examining
You should lower your standards
It's completely random and meaningless

questions.question: Authentic self-presentation in dating means:
options: Revealing all your trauma on the first date
Being the 'best version' of yourself (hiding flaws)
Showing up as who you actually are, not a curated persona
Never sharing anything personal

questions.question: A healthy approach to early dating includes:
options: Deciding immediately if someone is 'the one'
Ignoring red flags because of chemistry
Gathering information while staying grounded in your values
Committing as soon as you feel attraction

subtitle: Date with intention, connect with authenticity
